org.radeox.util

Class StringBufferWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • org.radeox.util.StringBufferWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class StringBufferWriter
extends Writer
    The same as StringWriter, but takes an existing StringBuffer in its constructor.
    Version:
    $Id: StringBufferWriter.java 7707 2006-04-12 17:30:19Z ian@caret.cam.ac.uk $
    Author:
    Stephan J. Schmidt
